title: Automation.com - All Industrial Automation News and Products

items.title: Take Proactive Steps to Ensure Supply Chain Cybersecurity
items.author: Daniele Mancini
items.summary:
- The World Economic Forum shows supply chain challenges are the main obstacle to cyber resilience for *54%* of large firms, with *98%* reporting breaches, driving ecosystem-wide risk orchestration.
- Six drivers—*geopolitical tensions*, *AI/tech risks*, *regulatory proliferation*, *supply interdependencies*, *cybercrime*, and the *skills gap*—demand proactive governance and AI-powered monitoring.
- Models include **Centralized**, **Blended**, and **Standards-oriented** integration; plus *zero-trust*, continuous data collection, and post-quantum readiness planning.

items.title: Etching for a Greener Future: Why Energy Innovation Is Converging
How a Virtual Twin Turns Tariff Turbulence Into a Strategic Advantage for Manufacturers
The National Cyber Security Agency–State of Qatar Joins ISASecure
Case Study: Ensuring Environmental Reliability in a High-Density Data Center Expansion
Yokogawa and Kyoto Brewer Craft Bank Test Optimization of Fermentation Process with AI-Guided Temperature Setting Schedule
Automation and Digitalization to Form the Core of HANNOVER MESSE 2026
Rockwell Automation, Avvale and ESGeo Collaborate to Deliver OT-Generated Sustainability Reporting Solution
JR Automation Invests $4M+ in Forever Feed Technologies
items.summary:
- JR Automation invested over *$4,000,000* to deploy eight Forever Feed Technologies (FFT) Grow Systems, leveraging JRA/Hitachi automation to scale commercial indoor feed production.
- Each FFT Grow System can produce up to *50 tons* of sprouted grain per day using *95% less water* than field-grown alfalfa and can feed more than *2,500* animals.
- The systems can replace up to *700 acres*, cut transport emissions, improve feed-efficiency for dairy and beef operations, and advance long-term agricultural *sustainability*.

items.title: Otto Mation Comic Caption Contest: October 2025
items.author: Otto Mation
items.summary:
- *Caption* the Otto Mation comic by submitting as many entries as you like via the form for a chance to win a *prize*.
- The strip follows *Otto Mation*, an automation character tied to the *C.A.P.* (Certified Automation Professional) credential and industry humor.
- Published September 29, 2025, the post also invites readers to *subscribe* to Automation.com's newsletters for more content.

items.title: NEMA Announces 2025 Industry Award Honorees
What to Look for in Your Motion Control Feedback Device
Tosibox Rebrands as Tosi Amid Record Growth
items.summary:
- Tosibox rebranded as **Tosi**, reflecting *70% growth* in average subscription deal size, a new U.S. HQ in Irving, TX, and a doubled U.S. sales team.
- The company launched *TosiANTA* (Advanced Network Traffic Analytics), rolled out *TosiCARE* services, and showcased “Well Pad to Cloud in Five Minutes” to speed OT connectivity and security.
- Serving 800+ customers and 200+ partners, Tosi positions *TosiControl* as the fastest way to connect, protect and control *OT* networks with no service disruption from the rebrand.

items.title: End-of-Line and Warehouse Packaging Automation Market Projected to Grow by $2.4 Billion in Five Years
Mouser Electronics Celebrates Its 2025 Best-in-Class Award Winners
Global Robot Demand in Factories Doubles Over 10 Years
The Future of Process Automation: Unlocking the Power of Agentic AI
ABB Opens Hydroelectric Power Generator Line at Its Ring Motor Factory in Spain
Rockwell Automation Appoints Ahmad Haydar as Country Manager for the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Redfish-Embedded PLCs Revolutionize Data Center Cooling
Lane Electronics to Showcase High-Performance Connector Solutions at EDS 2025
Spectrum Instrumentation Breaks Ground on New HQ
items.summary:
- Since 1989 *Spectrum Instrumentation* has grown from a small development team into a global maker of modular PC-based digitizers and NETBOX instruments used in aerospace, quantum research, medical tech, and semiconductor testing.
- To support steady growth, CEO *Gisela Hassler* laid the foundation for a state-of-the-art headquarters in Ahrensburg (near Hamburg) on Sept. 9, 2025, consolidating R&D, production, sales, and administration with space for future expansion.
- The company emphasizes *quality* with a five-year warranty and 15–20 years of parts/support, serving clients like Intel, Siemens, and CERN.

items.title: Nordson Enables Actnano PFAS-Free Coatings on ASYMTEK
items.summary:
- Nordson’s *ASYMTEK* SL-940 and SL-1040 are now fully compatible with actnano’s *PFAS‑free* Advanced nanoGUARD (*ANG*) coatings, enabling manufacturers to shift to *greener* materials without losing throughput.
- actnano’s ANG eliminates energy‑intensive curing ovens while maintaining PCBA protection, reducing energy use and improving workplace safety.
- Nordson features (agitating reservoirs, circulating fluids/applicators, extraction filters, dual ultrasonic cleaning) optimize handling and ease high‑throughput adoption.

items.title: Who's Ramping Up R&D Investment in Lithium-Ion Batteries?
items.author: Shirly Zhu
items.summary:
- The lithium-ion battery industry is experiencing *intense technology-driven competition* with leading companies like CATL investing over $2 billion annually in R&D to innovate in materials and production for *energy density*, *ultra-fast charging*, and *long cycle life*.
- Emerging enterprises such as China's CALB and COSMX are accelerating R&D spending rapidly, with growth rates above 30%, focusing on advanced materials and diverse applications including *consumer batteries* and *drones*.
- Investment priorities include *performance breakthroughs*, *application expansion* into eVTOL aircraft and robotics, and *forward-looking technologies* like solid-state and sodium-ion batteries, with increasing integration of AI and smart manufacturing to reinforce competitiveness.

items.title: LevelBlue Research Finds Rising Cyber Threats to Manufacturing Are Driving Leaders to Prioritize Cyber Resilience
Seeq Named Leader in 2025 Industrial AI Analytics
items.summary:
- *Seeq* was recognized as a **Leader** in the inaugural Verdantix *Green Quadrant for Industrial AI Analytics 2025*.
- The evaluation highlighted Seeq's strengths in data processing, user interface, optimization, and its specialized *Pharma Suite* targeted for GMP compliance.
- This award underscores Seeq's **market leadership**, innovation, and commitment to advancing **industrial manufacturing** through AI and analytics.

items.title: C3 AI Named a Leader in Industrial AI
items.summary:
*C3 AI has been named a Leader in the 2025 Industrial AI Analytics report by Verdantix.*
*The company excels in predictive maintenance, supply chain solutions, and MLOps, with top scores in capabilities and momentum.*
*Customer successes include significant cost savings for Nucor and improved grid resilience for Con Edison.*

items.title: Libiao Robotics Opens U.S. Office in New Jersey
items.summary:
*Libiao Robotics has inaugurated its U.S. office in Hillsborough, New Jersey, to better serve its expanding North American customer base.*
- The 8,500 sq ft facility includes offices, a demo area, and a dynamic mock warehouse showcasing the award-winning AirRob storage system.
- The company emphasizes its commitment to innovation, local community engagement, and the expansion of warehouse automation solutions in the U.S.*

items.title: My ISA Story: Reducing Environmental Pollution, Operating Costs With ISA Standards and Procedures
My ISA Story: Low-Cost Automation, High Impact
items.summary:
*A career grounded in practical, cost-effective automation began with a simple relay panel and a $350 PLC.*
- The author emphasizes the importance of *standards, discipline, and principles* in creating reliable automation solutions.
- Key projects included re-platforming controls for reliability, restoring legacy plants, and supporting critical infrastructure, all while mentoring new engineers and adhering to ISA standards.

items.title: My ISA Story: From Seventh Place to Scholarship
items.summary:
- *Om Mandhane* shares how his journey with ISA began as a curious student and grew into a story of growth, community, and achievement.
- Despite narrowly missing the top spot at the India Automation Games, he learned valuable lessons and built strong bonds through hands-on projects and competitions.
- Winning the ISA International Scholarship was a key milestone, inspiring Om to mentor others and carry forward ISA's legacy of support and innovation.

items.title: My ISA Story: Finding Belonging, Purpose and Leadership in Automation
items.summary:
*A personal journey with the *International Society of Automation (ISA)*, highlighting how involvement fostered *belonging, leadership,* and *community*. 

- The author’s experience began with attending the 2023 Automation Leadership Conference, which felt like *home* and sparked their active engagement.

- They revitalized the *ISA Student Section at the University of Alberta*, built a thriving community, and gained *mentorship* from local leaders.

- Participation in ISA events and leadership roles expanded their *technical* and *professional skills*, fostering a deep sense of *belonging*, mentorship, and a commitment to giving back.

items.title: My ISA Story: From Shrimp Boil to Section President
items.summary:
- *Beginnings*: The author's journey with ISA started unexpectedly at a shrimp boil event in 2022, initially just to enjoy food and network.
- *Leadership Growth*: Over time, they took on roles such as Membership Chair, Program Chair, and now Secretary/President-Elect, showcasing progressive leadership.
- *Impact & Diversity*: Emphasizes the importance of community, youth involvement, and gender diversity—highlighting that ISA fosters growth, connection, and lasting influence in automation.

items.title: My ISA Story: Creating a Better World Through Automation
items.summary:
*The author shares their journey with ISA, highlighting milestones from local to international involvement.*
- Despite initial doubts, participation in ISA events led to meaningful global connections and recognition.
- The story underscores how *automation relies on people* to shape a better world and inspire others to volunteer and grow within the community.

items.title: Critical Manufacturing Appoints Arnaud Portet to Lead Market Expansion
items.summary:
*Critical Manufacturing has appointed Arnaud Portet to lead its market expansion efforts.*
- Portet has over 20 years of experience in MES, digital manufacturing, and global sales strategies.
- His focus will be on growing presence in highly regulated sectors like **pharmaceuticals** and advancing Industry 4.0 initiatives.*

items.title: ABB Named a Leader in 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant
items.summary:
- **ABB** has been recognized as a *Leader* in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for *Global Industrial IoT Platforms*. 
- Their *Genix* platform offers seamless data integration, AI capabilities, and support for key use cases like predictive maintenance and digital twins. 
- This recognition reflects *ABB's focus on innovation*, scalability, and its strong partner ecosystem, emphasizing its role as a *technological leader* in industrial automation.

items.title: Siemens and Machine Builders Agree on Data Alliance
items.summary:
*Siemens has formed a groundbreaking alliance with leading machine tool manufacturers to enable exchange of industrial data.*

- This collaboration aims to develop *generative AI applications* and an industry-specific Siemens Industrial Foundation Model.
- Use cases include *automated creation of machine part programs, predictive maintenance,* and *energy optimization.*

**Impact**: 8 | **Severity**: 7 | **Novelty**: 8 | **Long-term Significance**: 9

**Tags**: AI, Industry 4.0, Manufacturing, Data Security, Innovation

items.title: Heliene Enhances Solar Manufacturing with camLine MES
items.summary:
- Heliene implemented camLine's MES Solar Edition to improve *traceability*, *efficiency*, and *quality control* in its U.S. manufacturing facilities.
- The system enables *real-time monitoring*, detailed component tracking, and supports future expansion plans.
- This partnership positions Heliene as a leader in *smart solar manufacturing* and sets the stage for advances like AI integration and analytics.

**Scores:** {
  "scale": 7,
  "impact": 8,
  "novelty": 6,
  "longTermSignificance": 8
}

**Keywords:** ["solar manufacturing", "MES", "Heliene", "automation", "quality control", "supply chain"]

items.title: Schneider Electric and Conroe Transform Water Infrastructure
items.summary:
- **$50M infrastructure upgrade** enabling resilience, efficiency, and transparency across Conroe’s water network.
- **Accelerated site deployment** through modular, software-defined architecture, speeding capacity expansion and projects like the Silver Springs Bypass.
- **Cybersecurity and resilience** with secure-by-operations, disaster recovery and secure remote access for continuity.

items.title: ABB & LandingAI: Generative AI for Robotic Vision
items.summary: - **LandingAI**'s *vision AI* is integrated into **ABB**'s software, accelerating adoption of intelligent robotics. - The collaboration promises **up to 80%** faster training and deployment, with end users retraining the AI for new scenarios. - Beyond manufacturing, the partnership expands automation into *logistics*, *healthcare*, and *food & beverage*, driving more autonomous, adaptable robots.

items.title: ADMARES: Sustainable Housing with Siemens Xcelerator
items.summary: - *Siemens Xcelerator* powers ADMARES to design, validate, and automate modular homes via a *digital twin* and a *smart factory*.\n- ADMARES aims to cut up to *75%* of residential *CO₂ emissions* and generate *80% less waste* by producing homes at high speed.\n- The project illustrates a new industrialized housing model using *Siemens Designcenter*, *Teamcenter*, *Simcenter* and *Opcenter* to deliver connected, intelligent homes.

items.title: Case Study: Environmental Monitoring for Data Center Uptime
items.summary:
- **Environmental factors** like temperature and humidity drive data center uptime; overheating or condensation can cause failures.
- **ASHRAE ranges** (18–27°C, 40–60% RH) and real-time monitoring help prevent downtime and improve energy efficiency.
- The Moore Industries HTZ transmitter and DCIM integration enable precise sensing, rapid anomaly detection, and sustained uptime.

items.title: Why Micro Data Centers Power Smart Manufacturing
items.author: Mark Bidinger
items.summary:
- *Edge-enabled micro data centers bring compute to the factory floor, reducing latency and enabling real-time processing for robotics and AI-enabled quality checks.*
- *They bridge **IT/OT convergence**, offering modular, scalable designs with built-in resilience and strong security to keep production running.*
- *Across industries, fast deployments cut costs and downtime, helping plants prepare for EVs, digital twins, and private 5G edge networks.*

items.title: Yokogawa Signs Agreements With Toyota for the R&D of the Control Platform for a Manned Pressurized Rover
KUKA at ADM 2025: Advanced Automation
items.summary: - *ADM 2025 in Toronto* (Oct 21–23) will feature live demonstrations at booth 1401 by *DGT Solutions* and *OptiMach*.\n- The *KR 6 R500 Z200-2 SCARA* delivers cycle times under 0.36 seconds and is available in an *HO variant* for food and beverage applications.\n- A second demo with *OptiMach* uses a *KR10 R1440-2* with *real-time vision* and *AI* for auto-adjusted welding paths in a plug‑and‑play cell, plus a stationary AMR and strong support.

items.title: Planon named CMMS Leader by Verdantix
items.summary:
- Verdantix named Planon a Leader in the Green Quadrant: CMMS 2025, citing upgrade-safe configurability, **IoT-led automation**, and no-code workflows.
- The report highlights Planon’s predictive maintenance capabilities, supported through integrations with partners like Schneider Electric, plus digital twin functionality, real-time asset tracking and fault detection enabling data-driven interventions and SLA adherence.
- Planon’s CEO and Verdantix analysts emphasize Planon’s focus on efficiency, compliance and sustainability across multi-site real estate and facilities operations.

items.title: Mouser Launches Miniaturized Electronics Ebook
items.summary:
- Mouser teams with **Analog Devices** and **Molex** to publish an ebook on *miniaturized electronics design*, exploring trends in wearables, healthcare and industrial systems.
- ADI and Molex solutions such as the *ADAQ4224 μModule DAQ* and *Quad-Row connectors* are highlighted as enablers of smaller, lower‑power packages.
- Mouser provides an extensive *Technical Resource Center* and customizable e-newsletters to help engineers stay updated on these trends.

items.title: IT-OT Convergence in Manufacturing Innovation
items.author: Louis Columbus
items.summary:
- IT-OT convergence, guided by the *Virtual Twin* paradigm, links IT data with shop-floor OT to unlock *efficiency*, *sustainability*, and real-time responsiveness.
- Digital twins and *edge computing* with *unified architectures* enable predictive analytics, autonomous operations, and rapid decision-making across the lifecycle.
- Major roadblocks—*cybersecurity*, legacy infrastructure, culture, and *skill gaps*—must be overcome through *multidisciplinary teams* and targeted upskilling.

items.title: Rhopoint Celebrates 50 Years of Technical Excellence
items.summary:
- **Rhopoint Components Ltd** celebrates its *50th anniversary* in 2025, tracing origins in the UK to a strong European presence and partnerships with Isabellenhütte, VPG Foil, SRT Microcéramique, and other manufacturers.
- The company emphasizes *design-led distribution* with a portfolio including *ultra-precision resistors*, *high-reliability capacitors*, and *sensors* for aerospace, oil & gas, EV, automotive and medical markets.
- Leaders *Omer Mirza* and *David Beatson* highlight expanding product ranges and engineering-led support to capture opportunities in *emerging technologies* and evolving customer needs.

items.title: DTC Welcomes AMD to Accelerate Edge Digital Twins
items.summary:
- AMD joins the Digital Twin Consortium to accelerate AI-powered digital twin development at the *edge*, leveraging **Ryzen AI** and ROCm 7. 
- AMD champions *open software* with **Minions** and **Lemonade** cited as key enablers for next-generation digital twin capabilities at the industrial edge. 
- The collaboration aims to advance the complete digital twin lifecycle with scalable, secure deployments and *data sovereignty* across industries.
